text: The Handball Liga Austria (HLA) is the name of the professional handball league of Austria. == Competition Format == The season begins with a regular season between the ten teams. The first five teams qualifies for a first play- off round, while the last five plays a play-down round. At the end of this second round, the five teams of the play-off round and the top three teams of the play-down round plays elimination rounds. The last two plays a relegation round. == 2017/18 Season participants== The following 10 clubs compete in the Handball Liga Austria during the 2016–17 season. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Team !City !Arena |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |Alpla HC Hard |Hard |Sporthalle am See |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |Bregenz Handball |Bregenz |Handball-Arena Rieden Vorkloster |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |Handball Tirol |Schwaz |Osthalle Schwaz |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |Handballclub Fivers Margareten |Vienna |Sporthalle Margareten |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |HC Bruck |Bruck an der Mur |Hannes-Bammer-Sporthalle |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |HC Linz AG |Linz |Sport-Neue Mittelschule Linz Kleinmünchen |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |Moser Medical UHK Krems |Krems an der Donau |Sport • Halle • Krems |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |SC Ferlach |Ferlach |Ballspielhalle Ferlach |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |SG Handball West Wien |Maria Enzersdorf |BSFZ Südstadt |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |HSG Graz |Graz |?
